content: summer blossom has been designed to be a simple granny square but at the same time learn some new stitches along the way with just one change summer blossom is transformed pattern written in us terms there are helpful step by step photos to help you along the way pattern has been tested *use the hashtags #summerblossomgrannysquare or #buttonnosecrochet on social media so i can see all your wonderful projects* *this pattern has been designed and written by natasha thorley of buttonnose crochet please do not share copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell your finished items but please give buttonnose crochet credit ©buttonnose crochet 2018*
